charges.charge_disposition: imprisonment for 4 months; supervised release for 3 years; special conditions that deft participate in a program of mental health trmt to address anger mgmt issues as directed by the P.O and pay for cost of program; P.O.is directed to maintain the ps cychological rpts and is authorized to release such rpts if necessary, the PSI to the treating agency; deft shall be placed on home detention for 4 months; to commence immediately after imprisonment; during this time dft shall remain at place of resi dence except for employment and other activities approved in advance of the P.O.; no fine; CVF of $100.00 due immediately; deft to surrender to the designated institution by noon on 9/2/03; deft is to have no contact with the Social Security Adm inistration except through the U.S. Attorney's office; bond is continued.
